ComDesc = #{comdesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, GUID, MemberID, GroupID, mg_id, ComName, ComNameShort, MemberType, MCH_NO, SIT_NO, ComType, ComType2, ComType3, ComTransType, TradePassWD, TradePassWDUpDate, pysametd, MobileChecked, LinkMan, MobileCheckedDate, ContactTel, AddressState, AddressCity, Address, MapX, MapY, Frdb, ParentID, IsNoFinance, AdminUser1, AdminUser1Date, AdminUser2, AdminUser2Date, AdminUser3, AdminUser3Date, LastServiceDate, LastServiceId, ContactFax, BankType, TaxNo, RegIp, FirstSignDate, country, `state`, city, postcode, registerfrom, `Status`, ZxFlag, ReceiveSmsType, CreateDate, `CreateUser`, UpdateDate, UpdateUser, IsShowWeb, StartDate, EndDate, EmpowerType, IsShowCj, IsNeedZs, BankNo, InvoiceStar, InvoiceNo, PayPassWD, IsDownTd, gctrybegintime, gctryendtime, isgctry, ComUrl, BankAccount, MemberTypeDate, IsTry, IsSteelHq, doarea, icnumber, enterprisecode, variety1, variety2, variety3, variety4, variety5, sc_steelcom, dl_com, rz_market, jy_citys, jy_variety, zy_variety, IsDzGys, Tieluz, Tieluz2, Tieluz3, Tieluz4, Tieluz5, Matou, Matou2, Matou3, Matou4, Matou5, IsTj, px, website2, email, areacode, `scale`, sales, turnover, `source`, GZJadmin1, GZJadmin2, kpcom, kpren, kpaddress, kptel, try_out, yq_companyname, signCompanyname, yq_muban, yq_liucheng, yj_salestype, AllowMultiFh, JiaoGeFinishNum, PingJiaZongFen1, PingJiaNum1, PingJiaZongFen2, PingJiaNum2, AllowSendJingJiaSms, AllowDaiZhuCeMember, mg_att, downPrice, mg_endTime, mg_startTime, payType, city_id, mg_userId, mg_userName, mg_mid, mg_date, mg_ManageDaoZhanCode, mg_DaoZhanCode, mg_DaoZhanCangKu, mg_TiHuoMode, mg_CanKaoRemarkPrice, mg_canBuyOther, mg_canBuyMaterialType, mg_MaterialList, mg_isXieYi, mg_XieYiNum, mg_XieYiNum_1200, mg_isFenGongSi, mg_LockPrice, mg_canUseShengYuKeyRes, mg_MonthNum, mg_HeTongTotalNum, mg_CapitalPolicy, mg_SubordinateDepartments, mg_gcDayPriceType, mg_jijia_luowen, mg_jijia_gaoxian, mg_jijia_panluo, ComDesc from sys_company where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ID, GUID, MemberID, GroupID, mg_id, ComName, ComNameShort, MemberType, MCH_NO, SIT_NO, ComType, ComType2, ComType3, ComTransType, TradePassWD, TradePassWDUpDate, pysametd, MobileChecked, LinkMan, MobileCheckedDate, ContactTel, AddressState, AddressCity, Address, MapX, MapY, Frdb, ParentID, IsNoFinance, AdminUser1, AdminUser1Date, AdminUser2, AdminUser2Date, AdminUser3, AdminUser3Date, LastServiceDate, LastServiceId, ContactFax, BankType, TaxNo, RegIp, FirstSignDate, country, `state`, city, postcode, registerfrom, `Status`, ZxFlag, ReceiveSmsType, CreateDate, `CreateUser`, UpdateDate, UpdateUser, IsShowWeb, StartDate, EndDate, EmpowerType, IsShowCj, IsNeedZs, BankNo, InvoiceStar, InvoiceNo, PayPassWD, IsDownTd, gctrybegintime, gctryendtime, isgctry, ComUrl, BankAccount, MemberTypeDate, IsTry, IsSteelHq, doarea, icnumber, enterprisecode, variety1, variety2, variety3, variety4, variety5, sc_steelcom, dl_com, rz_market, jy_citys, jy_variety, zy_variety, IsDzGys, Tieluz, Tieluz2, Tieluz3, Tieluz4, Tieluz5, Matou, Matou2, Matou3, Matou4, Matou5, IsTj, px, website2, email, areacode, `scale`, sales, turnover, `source`, GZJadmin1, GZJadmin2, kpcom, kpren, kpaddress, kptel, try_out, yq_companyname, signCompanyname, yq_muban, yq_liucheng, yj_salestype, AllowMultiFh, JiaoGeFinishNum, PingJiaZongFen1, PingJiaNum1, PingJiaZongFen2, PingJiaNum2, AllowSendJingJiaSms, AllowDaiZhuCeMember, mg_att, downPrice, mg_endTime, mg_startTime, payType, city_id, mg_userId, mg_userName, mg_mid, mg_date, mg_ManageDaoZhanCode, mg_DaoZhanCode, mg_DaoZhanCangKu, mg_TiHuoMode, mg_CanKaoRemarkPrice, mg_canBuyOther, mg_canBuyMaterialType, mg_MaterialList, mg_isXieYi, mg_XieYiNum, mg_XieYiNum_1200, mg_isFenGongSi, mg_LockPrice, mg_canUseShengYuKeyRes, mg_MonthNum, mg_HeTongTotalNum, mg_CapitalPolicy, mg_SubordinateDepartments, mg_gcDayPriceType, mg_jijia_luowen, mg_jijia_gaoxian, mg_jijia_panluo, ComDesc from sys_company
select * from sys_company where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1
select * from sys_company where ComName like concat('%', #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.isechome.ecommerce.handler.StringTypeHandler}, '%') limit 1

select ID, GUID, MemberID, GroupID, mg_id, ComName, ComNameShort from `sys_company` where 1
and (ComNameShort like concat('%', #{searchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.isechome.ecommerce.handler.StringTypeHandler}, '%') or ComName like concat('%', #{searchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.isechome.ecommerce.handler.StringTypeHandler}, '%') )
and ID in(${comids})
limit #{pagesize}
select ID, MemberID, ComName, ComNameShort from `sys_company` where id in (${ids});
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_company (ComName, ComNameShort) values (#{comname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{comname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select ID, GUID, MemberID, GroupID, mg_id, ComName, ComNameShort from `sys_company` where 1
and (ComNameShort like concat('%', #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.isechome.ecommerce.handler.StringTypeHandler}, '%') or ComName like concat('%', #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.isechome.ecommerce.handler.StringTypeHandler}, '%') )
